title: 会无缘无故杀了你的ASCII蛋
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:isolated-terminal]]
[[module css]]
:root {
  --accentColor: 255, 10, 35;
  --darkColor: 5, 5, 5;
}
[[/module]]

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aan-ascii-egg-that-kills-you-for-no-reason/scp-egg.png
|caption=YOU BETTER FIND THIS CROM!!!
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Tstaffor
|no-right-margin=*]]
= [[[tstaffor-s-author-page|作者页]]] | [[[the-scip-squad-podcast-hub|播客]]] | [[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/random:random-page|感觉很幸运吗？]]]

**Tstaffor的最好作品：**
* [[[SCP-6557]]] - 跨时间十字引起的覆灭
* [[[SCP-5846]]] - The One-Stop Shop
* [[[SCP-6547]]] - 世界中的世界中的世界......
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source end=--]]

[[div class="expoblock"]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aan-ascii-egg-that-kills-you-for-no-reason/scp-egg.png width="1000px" ]]
----
[[[SCP-4162]]]是一个完美“绝杀你的”作品！我读了它之后立即爱上了它。我已经向朋友讲述过很多次了。现在去读读吧！
[[/div]]
----
